verses.verse: Now the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad<s%> <S%H1961>had<s%> a <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H6099>great<s%> <S%H7227>multitude<s%> of <S%H4735>cattle:<s%> and when they <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3270>Jazer,<s%> and the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead,<s%> that, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> the <S%H4725>place<s%> was a <S%H4725>place<s%> for <S%H4735>cattle;<s%>

The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad<s%> and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> and <S%H559>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> and to <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> and to the <S%H5387>princes<s%> of the <S%H5712>congregation,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H5852>Ataroth,<s%> and <S%H1769>Dibon,<s%> and <S%H3270>Jazer,<s%> and <S%H5247>Nimrah,<s%> and <S%H2809>Heshbon,<s%> and <S%H500>Elealeh,<s%> and <S%H7643>Shebam,<s%> and <S%H5015>Nebo,<s%> and <S%H1194>Beon,<s%>

Even the <S%H776>country<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5221>smote<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> is a <S%H776>land<s%> for <S%H4735>cattle,<s%> and your <S%H5650>servants<s%> have <S%H4735>cattle:<s%>

Why, <S%H559>said<s%> they, <S%H518>if<s%> we have <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H2580>grace<s%> in your <S%H5869>sight,<s%> let <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> be <S%H5414>given<s%> to your <S%H5650>servants<s%> for a <S%H272>possession,<s%> and <S%H5674>bring<s%> us not <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan.<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad<s%> and to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben,<s%> Shall your <S%H251>brothers<s%> <S%H935>go<s%> to <S%H4421>war,<s%> and shall you <S%H3427>sit<s%> <S%H6311>here?<s%>

And <S%H4100>why<s%> <S%H5106>discourage<s%> you the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> from <S%H5674>going<s%> <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> has <S%H5414>given<s%> them?
<S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> your <S%H1>fathers,<s%> when I <S%H7971>sent<s%> them from <S%H6947>Kadeshbarnea<s%> to <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H776>land.<s%>

For when they <S%H5927>went<s%> up to the <S%H5158>valley<s%> of <S%H812>Eshcol,<s%> and <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H776>land,<s%> they <S%H5106>discouraged<s%> the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> that they should not <S%H935>go<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> had <S%H5414>given<s%> them.
And the <S%H3068>LORD's<s%> <S%H639>anger<s%> was <S%H2734>kindled<s%> the <S%H1931>same<s%> <S%H3117>time,<s%> and he <S%H7650>swore,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H518>Surely<s%> none of the <S%H582>men<s%> that <S%H5927>came<s%> up out of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> from <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> and <S%H4605>upward,<s%> shall <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H127>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H7650>swore<s%> to <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> to <S%H3327>Isaac,<s%> and to <S%H3290>Jacob;<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> they have not <S%H4390>wholly<s%> <S%H310>followed<s%> me:

<S%H3588>Save<s%> <S%H518><s%> <S%H3612>Caleb<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3312>Jephunneh<s%> the <S%H7074>Kenezite,<s%> and <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5126>Nun:<s%> for they have <S%H4390>wholly<s%> <S%H310>followed<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD's<s%> <S%H639>anger<s%> was kindled against <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and he made them <S%H5128>wander<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H8141>years,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1755>generation,<s%> that had <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> was <S%H8552>consumed.<s%>

And, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> you are <S%H6965>risen<s%> up in your <S%H1>fathers'<s%> <S%H8478>stead,<s%> an <S%H8635>increase<s%> of <S%H2400>sinful<s%> <S%H582>men,<s%> to <S%H5595>augment<s%> <S%H5750>yet<s%> the <S%H2740>fierce<s%> <S%H639>anger<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H413>toward<s%> <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

For if you <S%H7725>turn<s%> away from <S%H310>after<s%> him, he will <S%H5750>yet<s%> <S%H3254>again<s%> <S%H5117>leave<s%> them in the <S%H4057>wilderness;<s%> and you shall <S%H7843>destroy<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5971>people.<s%>

And they <S%H5066>came<s%> <S%H5066>near<s%> to him, and <S%H559>said,<s%> We will <S%H1129>build<s%> <S%H1488>sheepfolds<s%> <S%H6629><s%> <S%H6311>here<s%> for our <S%H4735>cattle,<s%> and <S%H5892>cities<s%> for our <S%H2945>little<s%> ones:

But we <S%H587>ourselves<s%> will go <S%H2363>ready<s%> <S%H2502>armed<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> we have <S%H935>brought<s%> them to their <S%H4725>place:<s%> and our <S%H2945>little<s%> ones shall <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in the <S%H4013>fenced<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> <S%H6440>because<s%> of the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H776>land.<s%>

We will not <S%H7725>return<s%> to our <S%H1004>houses,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> have <S%H5157>inherited<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> his <S%H5159>inheritance.<s%>

For we will not <S%H5157>inherit<s%> with them <S%H5921>on<s%> <S%H5676>yonder<s%> <S%H5676>side<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> or <S%H1973>forward;<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> our <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> is <S%H935>fallen<s%> to us <S%H5921>on<s%> this <S%H5676>side<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> <S%H4217>eastward.<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to them, <S%H518>If<s%> you will <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1697>thing,<s%> <S%H518>if<s%> you will go <S%H2502>armed<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> to <S%H4421>war,<s%>

And will <S%H5674>go<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> of you <S%H2502>armed<s%> <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> he has <S%H3423>driven<s%> out his <S%H341>enemies<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> him,

And the <S%H776>land<s%> be <S%H3533>subdued<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> then <S%H310>afterward<s%> you shall <S%H7725>return,<s%> and be <S%H5355>guiltless<s%> before the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and before <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> and <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> shall be your <S%H272>possession<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

But <S%H518>if<s%> you will not <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3651>so,<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> you have <S%H2398>sinned<s%> against the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> and be <S%H3045>sure<s%> your <S%H2403>sin<s%> will <S%H4672>find<s%> you out.

<S%H1129>Build<s%> you <S%H5892>cities<s%> for your <S%H2945>little<s%> ones, and <S%H1448>folds<s%> for your <S%H6792>sheep;<s%> and <S%H6213>do<s%> that which has <S%H3318>proceeded<s%> out of your <S%H6310>mouth.<s%>

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad<s%> and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> Your <S%H5650>servants<s%> will <S%H6213>do<s%> as my <S%H113>lord<s%> <S%H6680>commands.<s%>

Our <S%H2945>little<s%> ones, our <S%H802>wives,<s%> our <S%H4735>flocks,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> our <S%H929>cattle,<s%> shall be <S%H8033>there<s%> in the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead:<s%>

But your <S%H5650>servants<s%> will <S%H5674>pass<s%> <S%H5674>over,<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> man <S%H2502>armed<s%> for <S%H6635>war,<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> to <S%H4421>battle,<s%> as my <S%H113>lord<s%> <S%H1696>said.<s%>

So concerning them <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> and <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5126>Nun,<s%> and the <S%H7218>chief<s%> <S%H1>fathers<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribes<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to them, <S%H518>If<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad<s%> and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> will <S%H5674>pass<s%> with you <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> man <S%H2502>armed<s%> to <S%H4421>battle,<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and the <S%H776>land<s%> shall be <S%H3533>subdued<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you; then you shall <S%H5414>give<s%> them the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead<s%> for a <S%H272>possession:<s%>

But <S%H518>if<s%> they will not <S%H5674>pass<s%> <S%H5674>over<s%> with you <S%H2502>armed,<s%> they shall <S%H270>have<s%> <S%H270>possessions<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> you in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan.<s%>

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad<s%> and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> <S%H6030>answered,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> As the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> has <S%H1696>said<s%> to your <S%H5650>servants,<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> will we <S%H6213>do.<s%>

We will <S%H5674>pass<s%> <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H2502>armed<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> into the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan,<s%> that the <S%H272>possession<s%> of our <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> this <S%H5676>side<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> may be ours.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> to them, even to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad,<s%> and to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben,<s%> and to <S%H2677>half<s%> the <S%H7626>tribe<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> the <S%H4467>kingdom<s%> of <S%H5511>Sihon<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites,<s%> and the <S%H4467>kingdom<s%> of <S%H5747>Og<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H1316>Bashan,<s%> the <S%H776>land,<s%> with the <S%H5892>cities<s%> thereof in the <S%H1367>coasts,<s%> even the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of the <S%H776>country<s%> <S%H5439>round<s%> about.
And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad<s%> <S%H1129>built<s%> <S%H1769>Dibon,<s%> and <S%H5852>Ataroth,<s%> and <S%H6177>Aroer,<s%>
And <S%H5855>Atroth,<s%> <S%H5855>Shophan,<s%> and <S%H3270>Jaazer,<s%> and <S%H3011>Jogbehah,<s%>
And <S%H1039>Bethnimrah,<s%> and <S%H1028>Bethharan,<s%> <S%H4013>fenced<s%> <S%H5892>cities:<s%> and <S%H1448>folds<s%> for <S%H6629>sheep.<s%>
And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> <S%H1129>built<s%> <S%H2809>Heshbon,<s%> and <S%H500>Elealeh,<s%> and <S%H7156>Kirjathaim,<s%>

And <S%H5015>Nebo,<s%> and <S%H1186>Baalmeon,<s%> (their <S%H8034>names<s%> being <S%H5437>changed,<s%>) and <S%H7643>Shibmah:<s%> and <S%H7121>gave<s%> other <S%H8034>names<s%> to the <S%H5892>cities<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> they <S%H1129>built.<s%>

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H4353>Machir<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> to <S%H1568>Gilead,<s%> and <S%H3920>took<s%> it, and <S%H3423>dispossessed<s%> the <S%H567>Amorite<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> was in it.
And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> <S%H1568>Gilead<s%> to <S%H4353>Machir<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh;<s%> and he <S%H3427>dwelled<s%> therein.
And <S%H2971>Jair<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> and <S%H3920>took<s%> the small <S%H2333>towns<s%> thereof, and <S%H7121>called<s%> them <S%H2334>Havothjair.<s%>

And <S%H5025>Nobah<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> and <S%H3920>took<s%> <S%H7079>Kenath,<s%> and the <S%H1323>villages<s%> thereof, and <S%H7121>called<s%> it <S%H5025>Nobah,<s%> after his own <S%H8034>name.<s%>
